_sText:
ze_shroomforest2

Taskuvaras created this map but never finished it.
I wanted to fix it, and Taskuvaras allowed me to do so, so I added new content to it.



Feature
  • 11 Special Items (2 zombie items)
  • Musics
  • Packed Entwatch config
  • 7 Levels 
  • custom_particle nomenclature
  • 10 minutes round

Changelog b6-->v1



• Entities: Replaced the worldspawn by a func_brush in the Level System (easier to see what happens in Hammer)
			Cleaned point_template(s) that specified non-existant entities
			Changed 'Water Item' physic system to a func_tracktrain system
				(Won't glitch anymore)

• Warmup:	Changed the invincible system so no player can get infected by zombies
			Moved a bit the Credits brush
			
• Level1: 	Added more HP to boss per player
			Changed boss message when beaten (Defeated instead of Dead)
			Fixed explosion effect if you dont kill the boss
			
• Extreme1: Changed game_text message on level start "Face the Groke once more"
				(Saw that done in the CS:GO port)
			Fixed ghost movement (no place is safe from them now)
			Fixed ghosts always spawning on the same origin after all others origin were done
			More and more ghosts will spawn
			Ghost do more damages

• Lvl2: 	Added a wood brush at the end of river to hide the graphic issue 
				(Saw that done in the CS:GO port)
			Added some explosions when the Fly leaves

• Lvl3: 	Teleport zombies in Heaven before the Fade ending so they cannot see the 3D Skybox from below
				(Saw that done in the CS:GO port)	
			The zombie clip is automatically killed few seconds after the Cloud reach the top
				(CT cant delay by not triggering the door)
			Fixed small graphic issue on a brush
			Aligned correctly some texture faces (mostly in the white rooms)

				
• TheEnd: 	Added more HP to the Dragon Boss
			Adjusted the positions of Satan during that boss fight
			More and more Tornado/Fire will spawn
			Fire do more damage
			
			Reduced Dragon's speed when he is defeated
			Added an actual 'cutscene' if you dont kill the Dragon fast enough
				(Instead of randomly killing everyone on the butterfly)
			
			Added more HP to Satan Boss in hell
			Moved a bit the trigger to start the Boss fight
				(It will start when someone reach the last platform)
			Added platforms on the sides for zombies
				CT now need to defend the left side, the front and the right side
			More and more falling rocks will spawn
			Rocks do more damage
			Rocks still spawn after the Boss is defeated
			
			After butterfly reach the end, the minions and the cage explode
			
			Added a surprise at the end of this level :)
			
• ZM:		ZM mode is removed (See surprise above)


Changelog b2-->b6


___________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Changelog b2-->b3
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Fixed glitch win on ext1 and lvl2/ext2
Changed dragon hitbox (should now be killable)
Minor fix and change

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Changelog b3-->b4
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Glitch win on lvl2/ext2 should be finally fixed
Cubemap reflection in lvl3 are brighter. The white rooms now dont have visible corner.
Changed Lvl3,Ext3 end a little. The area where you could see through wall is changed
The zombie item has a bigger trigger, and now spawn on TheEnd
Last Boss HP should be better now (dragon have same hp, satan hell hp are reduced to make the map beatable under 9 min).
Lasers are faster
Congratulation message on map win is visible now
Added missing outputs on the Zombie win Trigger (last level)
Moved a little a destination in ZM (not too fall in water when you take the teleporter)
Other stuff

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Changelog b4-->b5
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________

• General:			Added many entities to Templates (which were spawned in the map even when not needed)
					Map now set the Roundtime to 10
					Map dont use the cfg file now, cvar are within the map
					Zombie spawntime is 7 sec (instead of 8)
					More zombies will spawn (the zombie ratio was too high)
					Fps should be improved in some part

• Mines Item:		Freeze sound doesnt depend anymore of Ice Item
			
• Water Item:		Fixed the item stopping when players would shoot at the invisible physbox
					Reduced the size of the push
					
• Zombie Item: 		Fixed the spelling error (AS instead of HAS).
					And changed console message, since it's not the only zombie item now
					Changed cooldown from 60 to 75
					Modified the way it work: You now throw it and it drug people inside the trigger after few seconds

• Zombie Cloud: 	New item.
					When used, it spawn a thunder cloud, above the nearest player, that will kill every CT under it, after 2 seconds 		

			

• Level1: 	Put the Fly few unit higher so people dont fall off it when it leave
			Aligned correctly the Exit of boss room
			Cant see the Outside from boss room

• Level2: 	People getting stuck in ground because of Leaf get teleported
			Boss hp glitch shouldnt happen
			Added a physbox where the hp bar is, so it still deal damage if people shoot on it
			Removed some boxes at end
			
• Extreme2: Boxes explosion now work everytime
			Fixed glitch win (removed an old output that Killed the fail trigger)

• Fixed Nuke glitch on Level3, Ext3, TheEnd		

• Level3: 	Added some Clouds for plateformes that were floating in the air
			Reflections in first white room should be better
			Moved the rotating angels at the end of the Level
			
• Extreme3: Made the angel platform larger for better visibility

• TheEnd: 	The 1st Cloud explode some seconds after it reach the Heaven
			Cloud barrier explosion now work everytime
			After the 2nd Cloud reach other side, zombie are teleported faster
			People shouldnt get stuck in the brush Clouds anymore
			People stuck in planks are teleported

			Increased Dragon HP
			Increased damage from Fire during dragon boss
			
			Made some part of Hell ground solid
			Falling Rock will spawn more fast with time(like Web in Ext2) 
			
			Increased Satan HP during Laser part
			
			Zombie Cage is in a better direction to allow zombies easier jump at end of the level
			Fixed the Zombie trigger detection on butterfly
			
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Changelog b5-->b6
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________	

• Items:	Water Item shouldn't bug anymore

• Lvl2: 	Web Elevator cannot get blocked anymore

• Ext2: 	Glitch win really fixed this time

• Ext3: 	Fixed End TP glitch (after the laser)

• TheEnd: 	Fixed an invisible hole in the zombie cage
			Added a little more HP to Satan Boss


Report any bugs, glitches or crash you encounter here. Thanks.

ze_shroomforest_v4_5: http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/186471
